install.name: Content - RandomContent
install.author: Joe Guo
install.description: RandomContent-This Plugin shows a list of published items randomly of the same category as what the user browse.

param.name: tableHeader
param.label: Table Header
param.description: Show at the table header, default is Random Content

param.name: Exclude_Category_Ids
param.label: Exclude category ids
param.description: The Articles in the category will not show random content, Seperator by comma ','.

param.name: Category_Ids
param.label: Category ids
param.description: The random articles will only from the categories, Seperator by comma ','.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default 10)
